title: Workload of CS 354, CS 320, STAT 340 & CS 570/ CS 542
body:
hi! I’m planning on taking these classes and trying to figure out if the workload is doable.

I haven’t decided between CS 570 and CS 542 being my 4th class but I’m pretty sure I will be taking atleast one of them along with CS 354, CS 320 and STAT 340.

any advice is appreciated!
comments:
I’m taking 354 and 320 right now. Here’s what I can say:

354: my class with the heaviest workload right now. You are responsible for a project every week, a homework (quiz like in 252) every week, shorter activities occasionally, and a lot of readings. So far it’s a bit challenging because of the details of C but not terrible.

320: also a heavy workload, but the grading is a bit more forgiving. There are long projects every couple of weeks, a lab, a quiz every week, and shorter readings. Also it could be my instructor but the instruction is kind of all over the place 

Overall this courseload seems like a decent amount but doable

kind of late, but CS320/STAT340 are more than doable together. i had tons of free time and didn't really have an issue taking them with a 4XX math class and a gened.i would guess that this schedule would be tough, but definitely doable.
